channel.title: SAS on Sakshee Agarwal
channel.description: Recent content in SAS on Sakshee Agarwal

item.title: Bankruptcy Classification
item.description: Objective To predict the probability of a company going bankrupt. Approach Importing and preprocessing the data on SAS EM. Training various models on this dataset like like Decision tree, logistic regression, neural networks etc, to find the best fit. Performance enhancement part of these models. We did this by tuning various parameters to optimize the models in order to decrease the misclassification rate and increase the score.
